query: SELECT id, studentId, senderType, SUBSTRING(message, 1, 50) as msg, source, DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%H:%i:%s') as hora FROM chat_messages WHERE studentId = 1 ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 30;
